_module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”margin: auto 0;”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”df488d79-fa46-48ca-ace3-3d9ddb29bfc0″ link_font=”GothamBook||||||||” link_text_color=”#ff6600″ hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Ocean shipping is a cost-effective way to import and export goods internationally. An experienced international freight forwarder can help you by consolidating multi-client volumes in order to obtain the greatest pricing and benefits with the ocean carriers.

As experts in freight forwarding, including ocean freight, Your Cargo Concierge at A Customs Brokerage will work closely with you to ensure your shipment arrives at its intended location without any unnecessary delays.

Interested in learning more?

Call us today to learn more about how we use our industry expertise to help our partners quickly and efficiently transport goods overseas.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/ship.jpg” title_text=”ship” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”23bf9273-8d95-45be-925d-5e17cead9746″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” module_class=”ColumnReverse” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” width=”1400px” max_width=”90%” custom_padding=”30px|60px|30px|60px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”20px|40px|20px|40px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”|25px|20px|25px|false|true” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”20px” box_shadow_blur=”20px” box_shadow_color=”#30303008″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/anil-reddy-JXS6ZtOVZZw-unsplash-scaled.jpg” title_text=”anil-reddy-JXS6ZtOVZZw-unsplash” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”236fce37-e69a-4881-940d-c2feba202d54″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/john-lockwood-EMFBgGRVYME-unsplash-scaled.jpg” title_text=”john-lockwood-EMFBgGRVYME-unsplash” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”236fce37-e69a-4881-940d-c2feba202d54″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][dsm_lottie lottie_url=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/cargo-ship.json” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”39fe25d2-5a3f-4b79-b7f3-605380ed8141″ locked=”off”][/dsm_lottie][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”3acbf339-22b4-4c25-b6e9-e05753de7e09″]

Reliable Ocean Shipping Services

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”df488d79-fa46-48ca-ace3-3d9ddb29bfc0″ link_font=”GothamBook||||||||” link_text_color=”#ff6600″]

A Customs Brokerage is a licensed Non-Vessel Operating Common Carrier (NVOCC). We have the knowledge, experience, and relationships to secure transport at low prices, ensure compliance with regulatory organizations, and prevent unnecessary delays and fees. Use our automated tracking tools to get real-time information on your shipment status.

Our ocean shipping services include:

  • Full Container Load (FCL)
  • Less Than Container Load (LCL)
  • Consolidation
  • General Sea Freight
  • High-Value Cargo
  • Sea-Air Service

Organizing and tracking a successful shipment requires a lot of time and attention to detail. A single mistake can cost your company a lot of time and money — so let us take control of your shipment. Your dedicated support team will handle all of the logistics, so you don’t have to.

[/et_pb_text][dsm_lottie lottie_url=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/package-delivery-fill.json” module_class=”Lottie_image-inline” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”_initial” width=”80px” width_tablet=”70px” width_phone=”60px” width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” locked=”off”][/dsm_lottie][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”3acbf339-22b4-4c25-b6e9-e05753de7e09″ width=”80%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”23px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet”]

Other Freight Forwarding Services

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”df488d79-fa46-48ca-ace3-3d9ddb29bfc0″ text_text_color=”#000000″ link_font=”GothamBook||||||||” link_text_color=”#ff6600″]

At A Customs Brokerage, we offer more than ocean shipping services. Whatever your shipping needs are, our team can handle them. We have vast expertise in dealing with the complex regulations required by foreign governments, and our professional relationships make it easy to set up cost-effective transportation solutions.

Our professional freight forwarding services also include:

  • Air Consolidations
  • Direct Shipments
  • Charters

Our team of licensed and experienced professionals works closely with each of our partners to ensure all of their needs are being taken care of. Whether you need help complying with customs regulations or scheduling transport, we’ll make sure your shipment is taken care of.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” width=”1400px” max_width=”90%” custom_padding=”30px|60px|60px|60px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”20px|40px|40px|40px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|25px|30px|25px|false|true” border_radii=”off|||25px|25px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”20px” box_shadow_blur=”20px” box_shadow_color=”#30303008″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][dsm_lottie lottie_url=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/graph-line-growth-fill.json” module_class=”Lottie_image-inline” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”_initial” width=”80px” width_tablet=”70px” width_phone=”60px” width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” locked=”off”][/dsm_lottie][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”3acbf339-22b4-4c25-b6e9-e05753de7e09″ width=”80%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” locked=”off”]

Contact A Customs Brokerage

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”df488d79-fa46-48ca-ace3-3d9ddb29bfc0″ link_font=”GothamBook||||||||” link_text_color=”#ff6600″]

If your business ships goods overseas, a professional freight forwarding company can help you cut costs, save time, and give you peace of mind that your goods are being handled properly.

A Customs Brokerage is dedicated to providing all of our partners with the high-quality, customer-oriented services they deserve.

Contact us today to learn more about our ocean shipping and other freight forwarding services.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjM2In19@” button_text=”Get Started” button_alignment=”left” excerpt.rendered: Acb’s Dedicated Client Support System Manages Your Entire Logistics. Your Only Responsibility Is To Advise Us Of Your Order. Our Technology Will Keep You Updated Through The Supply Chain With Detailed Reports Informing You Of The Status. As an NVOCC-licensed company with the Federal Maritime Commission, you can trust us with the compliance of your shipment. We provide you the latest technology and personal service to ensure that your cargo reaches its destinations in the most cost-effective manner.
